title: (x) The Street Walker monospaced serif face - Verily Serif Mono {J Eward Sanchez}
author: thatfreep

comments.content:
That looks like a monospaced version of Bitstream’s [Prima Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20091025084508/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/prima-serif/) [/](http://web.archive.org/) [Vera Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20091025084508/http:/www.gnome.org/fonts/)/ [DejaVu Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20091025084508/http:/dejavu.sourceforge.net/wiki/index.php/Main_Page), but if it is, I can’t find it anywhere.

Given that these fonts are open source, it’s possible that this is a monospaced variant custom-made by the user/designer.

Edit: Found it! It’s [Verily Serif Mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20091025084508/http:/www.geocities.com/hartke01/), based on Vera Serif.

<cite>{J Eward Sanchez}</cite>

Close enough, I guess. :)
